1462850.name: Wiloka
1462850.description:
Follow the story of two different people, a young woman who bears a huge debt and a young man who has been abandoned by his family. One day, they experienced something out of the ordinary... Only to find later that they are connected and affecting each other.



Features:
• Immersive Horror / Thriller Environment.
• Engaging Storyline
• Discovering Character’s Inner Thoughts Depending on Your Choices, How Your Interact with The Environment.
• Player’s Choice Play a Key Role and Will Determine How The Story Unfolds Around You.
• Challenging Escape Room Inspired Puzzle
